alert.note: Alert for Big Stone; Traverse (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 30 at 1:53PM CDT until May 30 at 2:15PM CDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: The National Weather Service in Aberdeen has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Traverse County in west central Minnesota... Northeastern Big Stone County in west central Minnesota... * Until 215 PM CDT. * At 152 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Johnson, or 17 miles west of Morris, moving north at 60 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. At 145 PM CDT, quarter size hail was reported 7 miles north of Odessa. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Trinity Lutheran Country Church around 155 PM CDT. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Aberdeen.
